All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Provides infrastructure to manipulate a BoardInfo object.
BoardInfo
Represents a chess board state using Forsythâ€“Edwards Notation.
BoardInfo.State
Represents the current state of the board.
ChessServer
A Server to manage a classic game of chess.
ChessView
A GameView to manage a classic game of chess.
Client
Main class for the chess GUI.
Communication
Facilitates communication over the network with strings and maps.
Coordinate
Represents a tile on the chess board.
FenUtility
Handles the parsing of Forsyth-Edwards Notation strings, which are the standard supported format of board information for this engine.
GameView
Extendable graphical view for a chess variant.
InstView
Displays game instructions.
MainView
Displays the main menu.
Move
Represents a move from one tile to another with an optional flat to represent special moves.
Move.Flag
Represents a special or conditional move.
MoveGenerator
Generates a List of legal moves for a BoardInfo object.
OutlineLabel
A display area for a short text string with a highlight.
PerftTest
PERF(ormance) T(esting) framework for this chess engine.
Piece
Represents a piece of a given color and type.
Piece.Color
Colors that a Piece object can have.
Piece.Type
Types that a Piece object can have.
PieceAdapter
A mouse adapter that listens on chess pieces.
PiecePane
A pane that holds chess pieces as JLabel objects.
Screen
Manages the graphical user interface for the chess application.
Server
Extendable server for a chess variant.
ServerCLI
A simple CLI interface for server-side manipulation of the board state and information.
Vector
Represents a two-dimensional translational vector.
View
View is a generic lightweight view.
